Service Details: - Assists local individuals and families in temporary financial difficulty who are in need of food- Also offers a Thrift Store
Hours: Food Bank Hours: - Tue,Wed: 9:00am - 12:00pm and 1:00pm - 2:30pm- Thu: 1:00pm - 2:30pm (by appointment)
Eligibility: Must provide ID for each person in family and proof of address
Address & Map: 9830 Bottom Wood Lake RdLake Country, BC     V4V 1S7View MapQuest Map
Major Intersection: Bottom Wood Lake Rd and McCarthy Rd
